name: GoD:ARENA
description:
Welcome to the Garden of Dance. I hope you enjoy your Aerial Rave Extreme Nature Adventure!

Controls:

Move - WASD/Arrow Keys or Left Stick.

Jump - Space Bar or A (Xbox layout)/X (Playstation layout).

Trick - Left Ctrl or B/Circle.

So... what is this?

At the moment, just a playground. Have fun running around bouncing off giant plants and orbiting small planets while breakdancing.

This was created for the 'A Game By it's Cover' game jam.  It was originally inspired by this Famicase design http://famicase.com/17/softs/013.html by Michael Shillingburg (IG: https://www.instagram.com/planet.gif/).

Is that it?

NO!

This being a jam game, it is very limited in scope. There are a lot of features being worked on. Subscribe and all that jazz to be notified of future updates.

What's next?
  • Actual levels.
  • More plant types.
  • Music and sound effects.
  • More tricks.
  • Combo system.
  • Manual camera control.
Known Issues:
  • The game is silent. May I recommend some smooth synthwave... (wink)
  • No friendly exit. You need to Alt+F4 or close the window.
  • You can perform the trick action completely for free.
